ygData.subject: Re: studded
ygData.msgSnippet: here is how i got to skill 80. train to 20 sharpen scalers to 41 skewers to 70 gorgets and bracers to 80 masks belts helms 1/4 at 80 skill
ygData.messageBody:
here is how i got to skill 80.

train to 20
sharpen
scalers to 41
skewers to 70
gorgets and bracers to 80
masks belts helms 1/4 at 80 skill

At 12:04 AM 5/2/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: DrgSlayr@...
>
>Hail I am new to this list so I am sorry if this has been asked before.
>
>What is the best way to get your skill up the fastest? I am now at 27 and
>sharpening weapons no longer gives me skill except for a few weapons.
>
>
>Thank you for your time

>Ron
